translations: n.（楼梯的）栏杆，扶手；（楼梯扶手上的一根）竖杆

phrs.translation: 尼斯特, 栏杆, 栏杆柱, 栏杆的支柱
巴尼斯特, 班尼斯特, 斯科特·班尼斯特
班尼斯特, 巴尼斯特
弗莱彻, 弗莱切尔, 弗莱彻尔
班尼斯特, 除了一个叫班尼斯特

sentences.sentence: Every room smelled of pine; the entire house was adorned with thistle; garlands wound around every banister.
sentences.translation: 每个房间里都有松枝的香味；整个屋子都用蓟装饰；花环缠绕着每段栏杆。

sentences.sentence: Every room smelled of pine; the entire house was adorned with thistle; garlands wound around every banister.

sentences.sentence: Hold the banister with one hand.
